title: Track Health Authority Commitments
description: As a condition of a drug approval, a company has made a post-marketing commitment to a health authority to conduct a new study. A regulatory manager must track this commitment.

tasks.description: Log the post-marketing commitment into the regulatory tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new record for the commitment, including its description and due date.

tasks.description: Assign ownership of the commitment to the relevant internal department (e.g., Clinical Operations).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the commitment to the head of Clinical Operations.

tasks.description: Periodically check on the status of the commitment to ensure it is on track to be met by the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends automated reminders and requests status updates from the owner.

tasks.description: Submit the final study report to the health authority to fulfill the commitment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Once the study is complete, the agent submits the report and closes the commitment record.
